MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 04-DEC-2020 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the KY8, KY9 and KY15 postcode areas of Cupar and Leven. Our team have managed to remotely restore power to some customers however due to adverse weather conditions and the extent of the repairs required, we now expect all remaining supplies to be restored by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:53am on Friday, 4th December 2020.
